title: New: J£ZUS MILLION – No Progress
content:
When I’m not harking on about young beatmakers needing to change up the game, I’m ranting about how brilliant J£ZUS MILLION is, one of the few young producers really making a lasting impression.

Taking from his debut EP expected later this year entitled Eat Dat, No Progress is a glitterbug of a track, rolling handclaps and mindfucks all round. How long before a Wacka or a Lil’ B comes a calling? Surely it’s only a matter of time.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
